response.overview: This film allows you to journey through the mind of a Serial Killer with an odd case of Amnesia. Follow Gaige as he journeys to the depths of his soul to gain the truth. Can he keep the people he loves safe from harm or will he eventually succumb? At 25, Gaige Tandum (Neil Willoughby) is living the life that most guys his age can only dream of. Owner of Breath Nightclub, Gaige knows all the right people and dates only the hottest girls. Life is good for Gaige, or at least he thought so. After falling victim to an attack, he slowly begins to realize a terrifying dark side to his life. Secrets unravel including past loves and enemies leaving Gaige wondering where he really belongs.
response.title: Oblivion
